question: During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should contact him about a possible job in one of his restaurants.Write a letter to this businessman. In your letter-remind him when and where you met-tell him what kind of job you are interested in-say why you think you would be suitable for the job
text: Hope your journey was enjoyable. I am writing with reference to our casual chat during our journey together from Canada to India. As discussed, I am writing to enquire about some possible jobs in  one of your restaurants.

I would like to express my interest in the position of Manager as I have recently graduated from the University of Canada with a specialization in Hotel Management. I have completed my undergraduate degree with a specialization in cooking. However, I have completed my internship with the hotel Hayat in Canada.

I will surely be the best fit for such a position as I believe my internship experience will be of great help to accomplish all the tasks for your restaurant. I am also open to the position of a chef as I have to collect funds for the execution of my  future plan to start my own restaurant.

I would be grateful if you could help in offering me a job. I have attached my resume in which I have included all my achievements. My contact number is  9952952892. Awaiting a positive response. Thank you.
